nodes.text: To the Teeth was a weapon shop located in Point Nadir. It was owned by Yalpor Waar and was one of the most respected and well-stocked shops in the shadowport. It was said almost any weapon up to a capital-scale turbolaser could be purchased in the shop. Most weapons and explosives could be delivered in an hour, but exotic weapons might take a day to procure.
It was only open a few hours a day each morning, but Yalpor would meet special customers after hours if they made appointments. The shop was located in a large warehouse in the Trade District.
